content.raw: I think a test like [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/test/integration/all\_symbols\_have\_version.bash.in](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/test/integration/all_symbols_have_version.bash.in) is important. Just one missed symbol could cause it to conflict with another major version of ignition rendering, but fixing after the fact requires breaking ABI.
content.html: I think a test like #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/default/test/integration/all_symbols_have_version.bash.in is important. Just one missed symbol could cause it to conflict with another major version of ignition rendering, but fixing after the fact requires breaking ABI.
